creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: landscape with five male figures--one seated on left and four standing in middle with two horses, one black and one white; expressions of men are exaggerated and humorous
signed: LLC: {Soga Jirō Teruo ga} (painted by Soga Jirō Teruo)
title: Legends of Kyo Yū, Sō Ho, and Haku Raku
